trans-unit.source: Performs data binding of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> Web server control within a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Wykonuje wiązanie danych z <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> sieci Web serwera kontroli w ramach wizualnego projektanta.

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDataBindingHandler class performs design-time data binding of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ListControlDataBindingHandler wykonuje wiązanie danych czasu projektowania <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDataBindingHandler class is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ListControlDataBindingHandler odwołuje się do niego <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>przy użyciu <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>klasy.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method performs the design-time data binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework wewnętrznie tworzy nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>klasy po klasie odwołuje się do niego <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>atrybutu.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>

trans-unit.source: Performs data binding on the specified control.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control that is specified by `control` has a data source specified within its <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> property, the DataBindControl method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, and then adds a string message indicating that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>formant, który jest określony przez `control` źródła danych określony w ramach jego <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A>Właściwości, metoda DataBindControl czyści <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>Kolekcja <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, a następnie dodaje wiadomości ciąg wskazujący, że <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>jest powiązany z danymi do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>kolekcji.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the document that contains the control.
